conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent axonometric cutaway view with visible wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined vertical surfaces and clean cutaways.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Adjacency is mostly correct, though Bedroom 1 and Bedroom 2 positions are slightly adjusted/swapped relative to the original plan's right-hand wing; wall counts align with the complex layout.

interior_elements.notes: Very high fidelity in furniture placement, including specific items like the dining chairs, L-shaped kitchen, and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity, but points deducted for heavy text label contamination on the 3D geometry and floor.

detected_errors.description: Floor and walls contain printed text labels (TOILET-3, DECK, etc.) which clutter the 3D presentation.
The layout on the right side of the plan (Bedroom 1/2) has been condensed and slightly mirrored compared to the 2D source.

summary: A high-quality 3D cutaway that preserves the vast majority of the complex floor plan's structural and interior logic despite minor layout shifts and UI clutter.
